title: Cruise to Mexico
descrpition: Our first real vacation together! Got on a Carnvial Cruise ship in a cold Galveston to go to Cozumel for a few days.

title: Trip to Colorado
descrpition: Discovered our love for this magical place and have been going back a few times a year ever since.

title: Wedding in Cabo
descrpition: Spent a week in Cabo San Lucas to celebrate our friend Sarah's wedding.

title: Engaged in NYC
descrpition: After Eric spent the first part of the week working in NYC, Zack come to join Thursday through Sunday. We went and saw all the typical tourist things, including the met; where Eric proposed on the rooftop overlooking Central Park and the Skyline. A trip to remember
